```{r}
require("leaflet")
load("cityData/geodata_Rotterdam.RData")
```
```{r}
m <- leaflet() %>%
  addTiles() %>%  # Add default OpenStreetMap map tiles
  addMarkers(lng=4.4777325, lat=51.9244201, popup="Rotterdam") %>%
  fitBounds(4.4, 51.8, 4.5, 52)  %>% # nice boundaries
  addCircles(lng=cbs100_rot@coords[,1][cbs100_rot$WK_CODE=="WK059913"], lat=cbs100_rot@coords[,2][cbs100_rot$WK_CODE=="WK059913"], fillColor = c('red'))


#after a bit of fidling I think that Pernis is "WK059913"


m  # Print the map
```
